location.name: The Fresh Food Co. at Warren Towers

menu_items.name: Scrambled Eggs
menu_items.description: Cage Free egs scrambled with salt and pepper
menu_items.ingredients: Liquid Whole Egg (whole eggs, citric acid, 0.15% water added as carrier for citric acid. citric acid added to preserve color), Kosher Salt (salt, yellow prussiate of soda [YPS]), Ground Black Pepper.

menu_items.ingredients: Alaskan Pollock, Red Tomatoes, Red Onion, Spring Parsley, Vegetable Olive Oil Blend (Arrezzio: 90% soybean oil, 10% olive pomace oil) (Spagnolla: vegetable oil [may contain one or more of the following: soybean and/or canola and/or corn oil, and/or sunflower oil], olive oil, beta-carotene), Canned Capers (capers, water, salt, vinegar), Tomato Paste (Sysco: vine ripened tomatoes) (Heinz: vine-ripened fresh tomatoes), Tap Water, Kosher Salt (salt, yellow prussiate of soda [YPS]), Ground Black Pepper.

menu_items.name: Vegetable Chow Fun
menu_items.ingredients: Firm Tofu (Soga: water, soybeans, less than 2% of firming agents [calcium sulfate, magnesium chloride, and/or glucono delta lactone])(Nasoya: water, organic soybeans, less than 2% of magnesium chloride, calcium sulfate), White Fettucine (semolina [wheat], niacin, ferrous sulfate [iron], thiamin mononitrate, riboflavin, folic acid), Sherry Cooking Wine (sherry wine, salt, malic acid, caramel color, potassium metabisulfite [preservative]. contains: sulfites), Tap Water, Broccoli, Red Bell Pepper, Whole Carrots, Yellow Onion, Chili Garlic Sauce (garlic, spices [including paprika, oregano, red pepper], salt, and onion), Less Sodium Soy Sauce (water, wheat, soybeans, salt, lactic acid, sodium benzoate: less than 1/10 of 1% as a preservative.), Vegetable Olive Oil Blend (Arrezzio: 90% soybean oil, 10% olive pomace oil) (Spagnolla: vegetable oil [may contain one or more of the following: soybean and/or canola and/or corn oil, and/or sunflower oil], olive oil, beta-carotene), Brown Sugar (brown sugar [when produced at Chalmette or Crockett facilities] sugar, molasses [when produced at South Bay facility]), Corn Starch, Fresh Ginger Root.

menu_items.name: Egg Drop Soup
menu_items.ingredients: Tap Water, Whole Chicken (Sysco: young chicken without neck and giblets)(Murray's: chicken whole fryers without necks and giblets), Liquid Whole Egg (whole eggs, citric acid, 0.15% water added as carrier for citric acid. citric acid added to preserve color), Fresh Celery, Yellow Onion, Whole Carrots, Scallions, Fresh Ginger Root, Dried Thyme Leaf, Less Sodium Soy Sauce (water, wheat, soybeans, salt, lactic acid, sodium benzoate: less than 1/10 of 1% as a preservative.), Corn Starch, Kosher Salt (salt, yellow prussiate of soda [YPS]), Dried Bay Leaf.
